name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use MSHTA
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use MSHTA in Scripts
query: (winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*\&\&.*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Vv][Bb][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\:[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*\.[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*\([Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Cc][Ll][Oo][Ss][Ee]\).*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.Payload:*set* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*\&&* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*mshta* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*vbscript\:createobject* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*.run* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*\(window.close\)*)`
